metadata.title: Sample Meal plans
metadata.description: This is a sample list of different meal plans designed for people with lactose intolerance, diabetes and hypertension.
metadata.disclaimer: This is a sample plan and may need to be adjusted based on individual needs and preferences. It is recommended to consult with a registered dietitian for personalized guidance.

data.type: 2000 calorie diet for lactose intolerant people

day1.breakfast: ¾ cup oatmeal with cinnamon, 1 cup blueberries, 1 tbsp almonds, 2 hard-boiled eggs
day1.lunch: Burrito Bowl: ¾ cup brown rice, ¼ cup black beans, 4 oz grilled chicken or tofu, 1 cup romaine lettuce, ½ cup fajita veggies, 4 tbsp guacamole
day1.dinner: 5 oz grilled steak, ½ cup wild rice, ½ cup roasted eggplant, 1 cup spinach salad with strawberries, 1 tbsp olive oil & balsamic vinaigrette

day2.breakfast: 1 cup Soy yogurt, ½ cup granola, ½ cup raspberries, 1 tbsp nut butter
day2.lunch: 1 whole Whole grain tortilla, 4 oz deli turkey slices, 4 tbsp hummus, ½ cup spinach, ½ cup sliced bell peppers, ¼ cup sliced carrots, ½ cup grapes
day2.dinner: 4 oz tilapia (broiled or baked), ⅔ cup whole wheat pasta, ½ cup zucchini noodles, ¼ cup artichoke hearts, ½ cup diced tomatoes, 2 tsp olive oil
snacks: 1 tbsp nut butter, ½ cup pretzels

day3.breakfast: Microwave Omelet in a Mug: 2 eggs, 2 tbsp Soy milk, ¼ cup diced bell peppers, Pinch of pepper, 1 piece Wheat toast, 1 tbsp of peanut butter, 1 tsp berry jam
day3.lunch: 1 - 6.5 oz can tuna or salmon, ½ avocado, ½ cup whole-grain crackers, ½ cup grapes, ½ cup carrots, ½ cup sliced bell pepper
day3.dinner: Beet & Brussel Sprout Bowl: 4 oz grilled chicken, ⅓ cup quinoa, ½ cup butternut squash, ½ cup roasted beets, ½ cup roasted Brussel sprouts, 1 cup spinach, 2 tbsp lemon-olive oil vinaigrette
snacks: 1 tbsp peanut butter, 1 Plain Rice cake, 1 banana sliced
½ cup Soy yogurt, ¼ cup granola, ¼ cup strawberries

day4.breakfast: Overnight oats: ½ cup oats, 3 tbsp flax or chia seeds, ½ cup Soy milk, 1 banana, 1 tbsp nut butter
day4.lunch: 4 oz grilled chicken, 1 - 6 in pita bread, ½ cup spinach, 1 tbsp tahini, Greek quinoa salad: ⅓ cup quinoa, ½ cup tomatoes, ½ cup cucumbers, ¼ cup chickpeas, 2 tbsp lemon vinaigrette
day4.dinner: Stuffed Sweet Potato: 4 oz seasoned ground turkey, ½ cup black beans, 1 baked sweet potato (can cook in instapot or microwave), ½ cup sauteed spinach, ½ cup diced tomatoes, 1 tbsp tahini mixed with 2 tsp lemon juice
snacks: 1 RX, Kind, or Laura bar, 1 peach

day5.breakfast: Breakfast burrito or taco: 1 whole-grain tortilla, 2 eggs, scrambled, ½ cup bell pepper and onions, 2 oz avocado, 1 tbsp salsa
day5.lunch: BLT Pasta Salad: 2 cups romaine lettuce, 4 oz turkey bacon or Canadian bacon, 1 cup Roma tomatoes, diced, ⅓ cup whole wheat shell pasta, 2 tbsp olive oil vinegrette dressing, 1 peach, 2 tbsp almonds
day5.dinner: 5 oz BBQ Pulled Pork, 1 whole-grain roll, 1 cup cucumber salad (cucumber, onion, tomatoes, and olive oil vinaigrette), ½ cup roasted or steamed zucchini and summer squash
snacks: ½ cup Air-fryer roasted chickpeas, 2 plums
1 turkey-jerky stick, 1 pear or 1 cup canned pear

day6.breakfast: Chia Seed Pudding: ½ cup soy milk, 2 tbsp chia seeds, 2 tsp honey, 1 cup berries, 2 tbsp walnut pieces, ¼ cup granola
day6.lunch: Buffalo Chicken Wrap: 1 Whole wheat tortilla, 4 oz grilled chicken, 3 tbsp buffalo/hot sauce, ½ cup chopped celery, ½ cup spinach/mixed greens, ¼ cup diced tomatoes, ½ cup carrots, ½ cup tortilla chips, ¼ cup guacamole
day6.dinner: Instapot Egg Roll in a Bowl: 4 oz ground turkey, chicken, or pork + seasonings, 2 cups mixed cabbage, shredded carrots, bell pepper, and onion, ⅔ cup brown rice, 1 tsp sesame oil
snacks: 1 turkey-jerky stick, 1 pear or 1 cup canned pear

day7.breakfast: 1 Multigrain bagel, 1 egg, scrambled with 1 cup cooked spinach, 1 turkey sausage patty, 2 tsp butter, margarine, or avocado
day7.lunch: ⅓ cup quinoa, ½ cup roasted or stemed sweet/regular potato, ½ cup beans, 4 oz teriyaki tofu, ½ cup purple cabbage, ½ cup roasted broccoli, 4 oz avocado, 1 tsp sesame oil
day7.dinner: 4 oz Balsamic glazed chicken breast, 1 cup roasted or steamed butternut squash, ⅓ cup corn, 1 cup roasted or steamed green beans, 1 tsp olive oil
snacks: ¼ cup trail mix, 3 cups popcorn
¼ cup trail mix, 3 cups popcorn

foodsToAvoid: Processed foods containing dairy derivatives (e.g., baked goods, ice cream, sauces)
Certain medications that may contain lactose

day1.breakfast: 1 cup oatmeal, 1 tbsp sliced almonds, 1 tbsp ground flaxseed
day1.lunch: Turkey sandwich on 2 slices whole wheat bread, raw veggies, hummus dip
day1.dinner: 3 oz grilled salmon, ½ cup baked potato, spinach salad, 1 cup skim milk

day2.breakfast: Scrambled Egg Beaters omelet with vegetables, 2 slices whole wheat toast, sliced tomatoes
day2.dinner: Chicken or steak stir-fry with plenty of vegetables ²⁄3 cup brown rice

day3.breakfast: Scrambled Egg Beaters omelet with vegetables, 2 slices whole wheat toast, sliced tomatoes
day3.lunch: Large green salad with grilled chicken breast 1 cup skim milk 1 fruit
day3.dinner: Chicken and bean burrito with whole wheat low-carb tortilla, salsa or pico de gallo, green salad

day4.breakfast: ¾ cup whole grain cereal, 1 cup skim milk
day4.lunch: ½ cup tuna fish salad on 1 whole tomato, 6 oz light yogurt, 1 fruit
day4.dinner: 3 oz grilled salmon, ½ cup baked potato, spinach salad, 1 cup skim milk

day5.breakfast: Scrambled Egg Beaters omelet with vegetables, 2 slices whole wheat toast, sliced tomatoes
day5.lunch: Turkey sandwich on 2 slices whole wheat bread, raw veggies, hummus dip
day5.dinner: Chicken and bean burrito with whole wheat low-carb tortilla, salsa or pico de gallo, green salad

day6.breakfast: 1 cup oatmeal, 1 tbsp sliced almonds, 1 tbsp ground flaxseed
day6.lunch: ½ cup tuna fish salad on 1 whole tomato, 6 oz light yogurt, 1 fruit
day6.dinner: 3 oz grilled chicken breast, 1 cup baked acorn squash, 1 cup steamed broccoli, 1 cup skim milk

day7.breakfast: Scrambled Egg Beaters omelet with vegetables, 2 slices whole wheat toast, sliced tomatoes
day7.lunch: Low-fat cottage cheese on 1 whole tomato 4 Ak-Mak crackers 1 fruit
day7.dinner: 3 oz pan-seared trout 1 cup stir-fried vegetables ²⁄3 cup brown rice

foodsToAvoid: Sugary drinks (soda, fruit juice, sports drinks, sweetened tea)
Refined carbohydrates (white bread, white rice, pasta, sugary cereals)
Excessive amounts of saturated fats (red meat, full-fat dairy products)

day1.breakfast: 1 serving Old-Fashioned Oatmeal, 1/4 cup raspberries, 3 Tbsp. chopped walnuts
day1.lunch: 1 serving White Bean & Veggie Salad, 1 medium apple
day1.dinner: 1 serving Garlic Butter-Roasted Salmon with Potatoes & Asparagus

day2.breakfast: 1 serving Old-Fashioned Oatmeal, 1/4 cup raspberries, 3 Tbsp. chopped walnuts
snacks: 1 cup nonfat plain Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup blackberries
10 dry-roasted unsalted almonds, 2 cups cantaloupe, cubed

day3.breakfast: 1 cup nonfat plain Greek yogurt, 1/3 cup blueberries, 3 Tbsp. slivered almonds
day3.dinner: 1 serving Baked Eggs in Tomato Sauce with Kale, 1-oz. slice whole-wheat baguette

day4.breakfast: 1 cup nonfat plain Greek yogurt, 1/3 cup blueberries, 3 Tbsp. slivered almonds
day4.dinner: 1 serving Chicken & Kale Taco Salad with Jalapeño-Avocado Ranch

day5.breakfast: 1 serving Old-Fashioned Oatmeal, 1/4 cup raspberries, 3 Tbsp. chopped walnuts
day5.dinner: 1 serving Slow-Cooker Chicken & White Bean Stew

day6.breakfast: 1 cup nonfat plain Greek yogurt, 1/3 cup blueberries, 3 Tbsp. slivered almonds
day6.lunch: 1 serving Slow-Cooker Chicken & White Bean Stew
day6.dinner: 1 serving Coconut-Curry Chicken Cutlets, 2 cups mixed greens, 1 serving Citrus Vinaigrette

day7.breakfast: 1 serving Old-Fashioned Oatmeal, 1/4 cup raspberries, 3 Tbsp. chopped walnuts
day7.lunch: 1 serving Slow-Cooker Chicken & White Bean Stew
day7.dinner: 1 serving Charred Shrimp, Pesto & Quinoa Bowls

foodsToAvoid: Sodium-rich foods (processed meats, canned soups, fast food)
Foods high in saturated and trans fats (red meat, fried foods, baked goods)
Sugary drinks (soda, fruit juice, sports drinks)
exercises: Strength training (supervised by a healthcare professional)
